title: By the King. A proclamation for the apprehension of Edmund Ludlow, commonly called, Colonel Ludlow.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the first day of September, 1660. in the Twelfth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
